snippet: China will allow foreign investment in seven telecoms value-added services in the Shanghai Free Trade Zone, with full foreign ownership permitted in five of the services, the official Xinhua news agency reported....

headline.print_headline: China to Let Foreign Telcos Offer Some Services From Shanghai Zone
headline.main: China to Let Foreign Telcos Offer Some Services From Shanghai Zone

lead_paragraph: China will allow foreign investment in seven telecoms value-added services in the Shanghai Free Trade Zone, with full foreign ownership permitted in five of the services, the official Xinhua news agency reported.
